title: Did the Federation request that the police remove the body cams during the opening protests?
subtitle: A false comment by the Federation representative led to rumours that the organization had asked the police to stop the cameras during the January 2017 protests in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The American Civil Liberties Union in Washington, D.C., requested that their cameras be disabled throughout the opening protests in 2017.
